title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps another Emmys night that ended in defeat. Peter Schrager checks in fresh off of beating us for the award. Albert Breer shares the latest on Commanders Owner Daniel Snyder. Plus, David Spade tells DP what he missed at Adam Sandler's daughter's Bat Mitzvah.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
